Content:
Going to @EthereumDenver? Come stop by the ZK Mini Summit 🏔️

There’s literally a talk called “Dumbass, crazy ideas for on-chain dApps.”

Banger.

🥇 in cheapest transaction costs.

Gas units could decrease up to 90% after 4844 👀

The sweet sound of scalability 🎶

Deploy zkSync hyperchains with @alt_layer’s Rollup-as-a-Service:

🧑🏽‍💻 No code
🤖 No infrastructure maintenance
🔀 Out-of-the-box third-party integrations

So easy even your parents could do it.
Where my @zksync NFT holders at? Which ones should I take a look at? I already got a @hue_nfts and an @ageofanura. @zkVeggies looking kinda cute

Will you heed the call to adventure, anon? 

The ZK Quest awaits.

Crypto is a global movement to shift ownership from authorities to individuals.

We’re working with the city of Buenos Aires and @Extrimian to build @Quark_ID, an open source protocol, to issue decentralized identifiers (#DIDs) for millions of Argentinian citizens to reclaim… https://t.co/co6nuIOVXu

When you were watching the Super Bowl, I studied ZK.

When you were farming 12% APYs, I mastered circuits.

While you wasted your days with unrealized gains, I cultivated a hyperchain.

And now that gas is expensive and the transactions are slow, you dare to come to me for help.

Are you still right-click-saving? 🖼️ Come on, it’s 2024.

Buy, sell, and create NFTs with @rarible on @zksync!

Games on zkSync just got a huge UX boost!

@Stardust makes it easier for studios to onboard gamers to zkSync with a familiar Web2 experience 🎮

Missed last week's zkDen?
Intern has you covered 🫡

Deploy a modular hyperchain with the #ZK Stack.

Secured by math.

1k TPS is a drop in the ocean of the world's demand for Web3.

The Internet can't run on a single server.

The Internet of Value can't run on a single monolithic blockchain, no matter how fast and willing to sacrifice decentralization.

The endgame is ZK singularity:

⧫…

ZK is the endgame

Every single chain that needs scale will upgrade to being validity proven, or be obsoleted

It's a straight up >1,000x improvement in performance, cost, efficiency & composability - 0 compromise

Anyone still FUDing are like horsemen FUDing automobiles in 1900
